title: akepalos.github.io
content:
akepalos.github.io

A website created just for fun. Above all, I created this website purely for enjoyment and entertainment purposes. Its conception stemmed from my intrigue with the fabled depths of the deep web.


Description

As can be seen, the whole website has a very simplistic and minimalist design. It contains two anchor links; which are (1) the death date and time calculator and (2) the tarot consultation.


The death date and time calculator generates a date based on the letters of the input name. Meanwhile, the tarot consultation randomly shows tarot card.
